img.title: Under Construction Sign

span.h4: FOR THE MOST UP TO DATE INFORMATION, PLEASE GO TO OUR NEW WEBSITE
You can find almost all of the information you will need at this new site.
Thank you for being patient with us as we make the move!

h3.span: Davenport Middle and High School teachers Jennifer Hargrave, Tyson Linstrum, Jeff Gunning, and Karen Edwards attended the ESEA conference in Atlanta, Georgia this week and received the Distinguished Schools Award for 2019 at the Awards Ceremony.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Congratulations

h2.a: Davenport School District Wins Project of the Year

hr.p: Davenport School District was awarded Project of the Year at the Forecast 5 Conference on October 11th. This award recognized the district's efforts to increase understanding of the funding changes affecting the District due to drastic changes in legislation. Click on the title above to watch a short video. Click on the link below to be taken to the business office webpage to see more information on the district's finances.

h2.span: Davenport Middle and High School awarded the 2019 Blue Ribbon Award!

div.a:
